body:
Is your spelling of "path" and "raypath" accidentally lowercase? The name of
the environment variable should be "RAYPATH" (all uppercase).

Regards,
Thomas

On Wed, Jun 8, 2011 at 1:41 PM, Hugo Testolini <hugo.testolini at gmail.com>wrote:
